Search Hotels Crafted amidst luscious mountains, Mughal-era landmarks, myriad lakes and birding spots, the best resorts in Meghalaya are steeped in subtropical modernism that complements diverse cultures and tradi (Read More)tions. While in Meghalaya, soak in warm hospitality, relish sumptuous local cuisines and escape to snug and scenic resort locations with opportunities for exploring sparkling lakes, waterfalls, rivers, bustling ethnic markets, spice gardens, living root bridges, trendy music scene and much more. The Arcadia Resort - Umroi # 1 in Resorts In Meghalaya 8.7 /10 (174 reviews) The Arcadia Resort - Umroi, located in Shillong, provides comfortable accommodation surrounded by a (Read More)serene environment. With a garden and terrace, the property offers a peaceful setting for guests to relax. Some units at this resort include a balcony, providing a pleasant outdoor experience. Guests can enjoy a continental or Asian breakfast during their stay. The resort is conveniently situated near Shillong Airport, just 6 km away. It features beautiful garden furniture, allowing visitors to unwind and embrace the tranquillity. Along with its essential amenities, the resort ensures a pleasant and serene atmosphere for a memorable stay. Resort with 3 room options ₹ 3,500 onwards View Deal > 2. San Nael La Resort, Cherrapunji # 2 in Resorts In Meghalaya 7.3 /10 (68 reviews) Resort with 3 room options ₹ 3,899 onwards View Deal > 3. Woodstock Farmhouse Shillong # 3 in Resorts In Meghalaya 7.1 /10 (12 reviews) Woodstock Farmhouse in Shillong, Jowai offers a top-notch experience for its guests. The resort has (Read More)a beautiful theme-based setup and a serene ambiance. The staff is humble, sweet, and always ready to fulfill your requests, ensuring flawless service. The rooms are neat, tidy, and luxurious, with well-maintained bathrooms. The on-site restaurant offers a great dining experience in peaceful surroundings. The food is good, though the service can be slow at times. The location is prime and saves travel time. The farm is situated between green fields and a mountain lap, providing a peaceful place to relax. Overall, Woodstock Farmhouse is highly recommended for a wonderful stay and delicious food. Resort with 3 room options ₹ 4,799 onwards View Deal > 4. Polo Orchid Resort, Cherrapunji # 4 in Resorts In Meghalaya 7.7 /10 (188 reviews) Nestled in the heart of Cherrapunjee, Polo Orchid Resort is a luxurious hotel surrounded by lush gre (Read More)enery and scenic views. The property boasts spacious and tastefully designed rooms, each equipped with modern amenities like a minibar and tea/coffee maker. Guests can indulge in a variety of activities like swimming in the outdoor pool, relaxing in the spa, or exploring the local area. The resort also has an on-site restaurant serving delicious local and international cuisine. Polo Orchid Resort is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy a peaceful getaway. Resort with 11 room options ₹ 11,111 onwards View Deal > 5. Ri Shat Sngi Orchid Resort by World Choice # 8 in Resorts In Meghalaya Ri Shat Sngi Orchid Resort by World Choice in Shillong offers a comfortable and peaceful environment (Read More) for guests. The resort features a garden, a terrace, and a restaurant, providing a pleasant atmosphere. The rooms at this resort are well-appointed with balconies, seating areas, stone fireplaces, and sound-proofed windows for convenience. Some rooms offer lovely garden views. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast with options such as continental or Full English/Irish. Conveniently located 16 km from Shillong Airport, this resort offers a relaxing stay in a beautiful setting. 9. The resort features a garden, a terrace, and a restaurant, providing a pleasant atmosphere.
